alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 5:14PM EDT until July 12 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Delaware County in central New York... Northwestern Sullivan County in central New York... East central Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 514 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Starlight, or 13 miles southeast of Deposit, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockland, Callicoon, Hancock, Fremont, Jeffersonville, Starrucca, Hiawatha, Shehawken, Starlight and Starruca. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
